original_title: 爆走！トミカヒーローグランプリ
overview: The Tomica Hero Grand Prix gets underway with the five Rescue Force members hoping to become the "Fastest in Rescue Force". During the race, Neo Thera joins in and tries to sabotage the other cars, leading to a nail-biting photo finish. This short was screened before the movie, Tomica Hero: Rescue Force Explosive Movie: Rescue the Mach Train!
title: Explosive Run! Tomica Hero Grand Prix
